attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
BRITISH GOVERNMENT TORTURING ME BY ILLEGAL MIND CONTROL WEAPONS, IT'S START 1996 WHEN I COME TO LONDON FROM DALLAS TX USA.
ANY WHERE IN THE WORLD I TRAVEL, ANY ONE I MEET, ANY THING I DO, ANY WORD I SAID IS UNDER CONTROL OF BRITISH GOV ALL AROUND THE WORLD!!! AND AT THE SAME TIME THEY SHOOTING BY MICROWAVE WEAPONS TO MY BRAIN AND BODY!!! THEY BURNING THAT PART OF MY BODY WHICH IS BROKEN IN JAIL IN IRAN??!!! THEY GIVING ME ELECTRIC SHOCK!!!! THEY RAPING ME!!! THEY CUTTING MY PENNY!!! WHEN I WATCHING SEXY MOVEI!!! WE NEED STOP TORTURE IMMEDIATELY RIGHT NOW ON MUHAMED TAHANI.
Muhamed Tahani
